params.name: tokenizer
params.description: The tokenizer used for encoding the data.

params.name: padding
params.description: Select a strategy to pad the returned sequences (according to the models padding side and padding index)among:True or longest (default): Pad to the longest sequence in the batch (or no padding if only a singlesequence is provided).max_length: Pad to a maximum length specified with the argument max_length or to the maximumacceptable input length for the model if that argument is not provided.False or do_not_pad: No padding (i.e., can output a batch with sequences of different lengths).

params.name: max_length
params.description: Maximum length of the returned list and optionally padding length (see above).

params.name: pad_to_multiple_of
params.description: If set will pad the sequence to a multiple of the provided value.This is especially useful to enable the use of Tensor Cores on NVIDIA hardware with compute capability >=7.0 (Volta).

params.name: label_pad_token_id
params.description: The id to use when padding the labels (-100 will be automatically ignore by PyTorch loss functions).

params.name: return_tensors
params.description: The type of Tensor to return. Allowable values are np, pt and tf.
